comments:
While trying to open a target workbench on I20060214-0800, I get a ClassDefNotFound error for IQuickAssistAssistant when I try to open a Java Editor.  

I first assumed I had incompatible versions in my host workspace.  But I would expect that using I20060214-0800 and the latest from HEAD as of 20060214-1400, wouldn't cause missing classes.  I do not have the latest JDT-UI loaded, but I am running the latest workbench, jface, jface.text.  The class IQuickAssistAssistant is in my host workspace, so I don't know why it's not found.

Tried it again with an empty host workspace.  Editor opens normally.  So this would appear to be a problem with what I've got loaded, or else with the workspace build, etc.
Please reopen with more detailed steps to reproduce. Maybe you installed over an existing install without using -clean.
